values: To worsen is to get worse.
The weather suddenly worsened, and we had to stay inside.
vi. 恶化；变得更坏；更坏

vt. & vi. (使)变得更坏,(使)恶化

时 态:  
worsened, worsening, worsens

worsened, worsening, worsens
